Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class MatchStartController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.MatchStartController
public class MatchStartController
extends GUIController
This controller is responsible for showing initial info about the match, and eventually making challenger choose start player. It also shows status of match setup, with other player's actions
